column4: Is there any easy CD/DVD-recorder application for the console?
I can't ping, SSH or access my system local. I need help now. Please.
what happens when you try to login locally?
By this I assume you mean physically sitting at the computer.
Nothing. The screen is just black.
black from poweron?  No grub message?  no bios message?
But it's also black with IPCop, but not with a Windows computer I tried with.
I'm not following you.
It's so less stressful in PM. Can we take it there?
prefer to keep it here, I'm in a few channels and it's easier not to have to switch windows every 3 seconds to follow them
plus it allows someone else to jump in with info if they have any
Okay, but then I make a summary and give it here. Hold on. It takes a couple of minutes.
k

About 120 days ago I turned on the computer and yesterday a heard a strange sound like a cable got disconnected, but I was okay. // Today I tried to access the computer with SSH (remote) and I got disconnected with the messages "No route to host". I can't reconnect, can't ping. // I go to the computer, touch the keyboard to get a picture, but nothing happens. // But I get a picture with a Windowscomputer a tried with. And I can access my IPCop
check your cables and reboot?
I can't reboot since I need to do a recovery.
I accidently deleted files and need to see what I erased. I'm going to do the recovery with tct and I don't know what happens if I turn off the computer.
I don't know what tct is.  Also, it sounds like for one reason or another your computer has been rendered inaccessible without reboot.  I don't know what to tell you, sorry.
I haven't used tct yet. I haven't touch the computer so much. I changed the right on a folder, transfered files there. That's all.
Is it possible I got hacked? :s
I changed the right on one folder on hdd2 to the user instead of root.
is it possible you got hacked?  It's possible but it doesn't sound very likely.
Cause a hacker wouldn't break the system?
